thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Roodmicrotec Secures Additional Funding To Enable Future Investments

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Roodmicrotec Secures Additional Funding To Enable Future Investments
text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - ROODMICROTEC N.V.:
* SECURES ADDITIONAL FUNDING TO ENABLE INVESTMENTS FOR FUTURE
* ADDITIONAL INVESTMENT OF EUR 500,000 * INVESTOR WILL RECEIVE 1,530,785 ORDINARY SHARES AT A SHARE PRICE OF EUR 0.326
* INVESTOR WILL ALSO RECEIVE AN EQUAL NUMBER OF WARRANTS AT AN EXERCISE PRICE OF EUR 0.42 WITH A FIVE YEAR OF EXERCISE PERIOD
* TRANSACTION WITH BLIKKENBURG B.V. IS EXPECTED TO COMPLETE WITHIN SHORT NOTICE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
